sections.name: A Life Taken, a Life Given

98.1: Place 1 damage token to both ships %game.mapMarker.a% and %game.mapMarker.b%.

101.2: Spawn Rending Drake at %game.mapMarker.a% and %game.mapMarker.b%, if adjacent Spitting Drake is alive and without %game.condition.stun%.

115.1: Remove one damage token from each altar %game.mapMarker.a% and %game.mapMarker.b%. The Manifestation of Corruption heals [C/2{%math.floor}] hit points for each damage token removed.
115.2: Remove two damage tokens from each altar %game.mapMarker.a% and %game.mapMarker.b%. The Manifestation of Corruption heals [C/2{%math.floor}] hit points for each damage token removed.
115.3: Spawn Valrath Savage and Tracker at %game.mapMarker.c% if alter %game.mapMarker.a% has no damage token on it, and three Black Imps at %game.mapMarker.d% if altar %game.mapMarker.b% has no damage tokens.

72.2: Spawn Night Demon adjacent and to the right of any door %game.mapMarker.3%

123.2: Spawn Night Demon adjacent and to the right of any door %game.mapMarker.4%

ashblade.1: Focus on the enemy with the highest initiative.
ashblade.2: %game.action.teleport% to the closest unoccupied hex adjacent to the focus.

manifestation-of-corruption.1: Play top two cards, using the first card as initiative. Perform the bottom action of the first card, then the top action of the second card
manifestation-of-corruption.2: Perform this action immediately when revealed, not in normal initiative order.
manifestation-of-corruption.3: The character with the highest initiative is forced to act as if their enemies were allies and their allies were enemies this round. On their turn, they will perform "%game.action.move%2" and then the top action of their leading initiative card. Afterwards, they discard both played cards, regardless of wherever the cards would normally be lost.
manifestation-of-corruption.4: All attackers targeting you gain %game.condition.curse% this round.
manifestation-of-corruption.5:
Summon one %data.monster.flame-demon%: normal for two or three characters, elite for four characters.
Summon one %data.monster.night-demon%: normal for two characters, elite for three or four characters.
manifestation-of-corruption.9: Summon one %data.monster.valrath-tracker%: normal for two characters, elite for three or four characters.
manifestation-of-corruption.10: Summon two %data.monster.black-imp%s: both normal for two characters; one normal, one elite for three chararcers; both elite for four characters.
manifestation-of-corruption.14: On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield% 3.
manifestation-of-corruption.15: Create one %game.condition.disarm% and %game.condition.poison% trap in each adjacent empty hex.
manifestation-of-corruption.16: %game.action.teleport% to the hex occupied by the farthest enemy within %game.action.range%+1 and simultaneously %game.action.teleport% that enemy to the hex you occupy.
manifestation-of-corruption.17: Summon one normal %data.monster.valrath-savage% adjacent to each enemy character within %game.action.range%5.
manifestation-of-corruption.19: All attackers targeting you gain Disadvantage for the attack.
manifestation-of-corruption.20: %game.action.attack%-1 on a new enemy within %game.action.range%4 of the first target, then %game.action.attack%-2 on a third enemy within %game.action.range%3 of the second target.
manifestation-of-corruption.21: Summon one %game.monster.aesther-scout%: normal for two or three characters, elite for four characters.
manifestation-of-corruption.22: On the next three sources of damage to you, suffer no damage instead.

sraka-the-wise.1: Double all Heal values. Heals target The Steel Lion if able
sraka-the-wise.2: If you apply %game.condition.curse% or %game.condition.bless%, apply a second %game.condition.curse% or %game.condition.bless%

the-steel-lion.1: Attacks targeting adjacent allies, target you instead
the-steel-lion.2: The first [C] times you suffer 6 or more damage, suffer no damage instead

tracker.1: Create one %game.condition.disarm% trap in any adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy.
tracker.2: Focus on the enemy with the lowest current hit point value.

uyart-ikkuma.1: All its summons are elite for three or four characters
uyart-ikkuma.2: It may consume %game.element.consume.fire% / %game.element.consume.earth% as if the element is currently strong when a %data.monster.flame-demon% / %data.monster.earth-demon% is present on the map

valrath-savage.1: All adjacent allies add +1 %game.action.attack% to all attacks
valrath-savage.2: All adjacent allies add +2 %game.action.attack% to all attacks

ability.You Date to Defy Me: Treff mich um mir zu trotzen

ashblade.1: Fokussiere den Gegner mit der hchsten Initiative.
ashblade.2: %game.action.teleport% zum nchsten freien Feld angrenzend an den Fokus.

manifestation-of-corruption.1: Spiele die ersten beiden Karten mit der ersten Karte als Initiative. Fhre die untere Aktion der ersten und die obere Aktion der zweiten Karte aus.
manifestation-of-corruption.2: Fhre diese Aktion direkt nach dem Aufdecken aus, nicht nach Reihenfolge der Initiative.
manifestation-of-corruption.3: Der Charakter mit der hchsten Initiative ist gezwungen alle Verbndeten als Gegner und alle Gegner als Verbndete anzusehen. Whrend des Zuge, fhre "%game.action.move%2" also obere Aktion der Initiativ-Karte aus. Anschlieend werden beide Karten abgeworfen unabhngig davon ob sie normalerweise verloren wren.
manifestation-of-corruption.4: Alle dich anwisierende Angreifer erleiden diese Runde %game.condition.curse%
manifestation-of-corruption.5:
Beschwre einen %data.monster.flame-demon%: Normal fr zwei oder drei, Elite fr vier Charaktere.
Beschwre einen %data.monster.night-demon%: Normal fr zwei oder drei, Elite fr vier Charaktere.
manifestation-of-corruption.9: Beschwre eine %data.monster.valrath-tracker%: Normal fr zwei oder drei, Elite fr vier Charaktere.
manifestation-of-corruption.10: Beschwre zwei %data.monster.black-imp%s: beide Normal fr zwei; einen Normal und einen Elite fr drei; zwei Elite fr vier Charaktere.
manifestation-of-corruption.14: Die nchsten drei mal wenn du Schaden erleidest, erhalte %game.action.shield% 3.
manifestation-of-corruption.15: Erstelle eine %game.condition.disarm% und eine %game.condition.poison% Falle in jeweils einem angrenzenden freien Feld.
manifestation-of-corruption.16: %game.action.teleport% zum Feld des weitesten Gegners in %game.action.range%+1 und %game.action.teleport% diesen gleichzeitig auf dein Feld.
manifestation-of-corruption.17: Beschwre jeweils eine Normal %data.monster.valrath-savage% angrenzend an jeden Gegner in %game.action.range%5.
manifestation-of-corruption.19: Alle dich anvisierenden Angreifer erhalten Nachteil.
manifestation-of-corruption.20: %game.action.attack%-1 fr einen Gegner in %game.action.range%4 zum ersten Ziel, anschlieend %game.action.attack%-2 an einen dritten Gegner in %game.action.range%3 des zweiten Ziels.
manifestation-of-corruption.21: Beschwre einen %game.monster.aesther-scout%: Normal fr zwei oder drei, Elite fr vier Charaktere.
manifestation-of-corruption.22: Die nchsten drei mal wenn du Schaden erleidest, erleide stattdessen keinen Schaden.

sraka-the-wise.1: Verdopple alle Heil-Werte. Wenn mglich visiert Heilung den Sthlernden Lwen an.
sraka-the-wise.2: Falls %game.condition.curse% oder %game.condition.bless% angewendet wird, wende %game.condition.curse% oder %game.condition.bless% erneut an.

the-steel-lion.1: Alle Angriffe an angrenzende Verbndete visieren dich stattdessen an.
the-steel-lion.2: Die ersten [C] mal die du 6 oder mehr Schaden erleidest, erleide stattdessen keinen Schaden.

tracker.1: Erstelle eine %game.condition.disarm% Falle in einem leeren angrenzenden Feld zum nchsten Gegner.
tracker.2: Visiere den Gegner mit dem niedrigesten TP Wert an.

uyart-ikkuma.1: Alle Beschwrungen sind Elite-Monster fr drei oder vier Charaktere.
uyart-ikkuma.2: Konsumiere %game.element.consume.fire% / %game.element.consume.earth% als wre das Element stark fall %data.monster.flame-demon% / %data.monster.earth-demon% auf der Karte sind.

valrath-savage.1: Alle angrenzenden Verbndeten fgen +1 %game.action.attack% zu allen Angriffen hinzu.
valrath-savage.2: Alle angrenzenden Verbndeten fgen +2 %game.action.attack% zu allen Angriffen hinzu.

ashblade.1: Se focalise sur l'adversaire ayant la plus haute initiative.
ashblade.2: Se %game.action.teleport% sur le plus prs des hexagones inoccups adjacents  sa cible en focus.

manifestation-of-corruption.1: Joue les deux cartes du dessus du paquet ; utilise la premire pour dterminer l'initiative. Effectue l'action infrieure de la premire carte et l'action suprieur de la deuxime.
manifestation-of-corruption.2: Effectue cette action lorsqu'elle est rvle, sans suivre l'ordre d'initiative normal.
manifestation-of-corruption.3: L'aventurier possdant la plus grande valeur d'initiative doit agir ce round comme si ses adversaires taient des allies et vice versa.  son tour, il effectue "%game.action.move%2", puis l'action suprieure de sa carte Principale. Ensuite, il dfausse les deux cartes joues, mme si normalement elles ne devaient pas tre perdues.
manifestation-of-corruption.4: Tous les attaquants le ciblant gagnent %game.condition.curse% ce round.
manifestation-of-corruption.5: Invoque un Dmon de Flamme : normal pour deux ou trois aventuriers, d'lite pour quatre aventuriers. Invoque un Dmon de la Nuit : normal pour deux aventuriers, d'lite pour trois ou quatre aventuriers.
manifestation-of-corruption.7: Invoque un Dmon de la Nuit normal supplmentaire
manifestation-of-corruption.8: Invoque un Dmon de Flamme normal supplmentaire
manifestation-of-corruption.9: Invoque un Pisteur Valrath : normal pour deux aventuriers, d'lite pour trois ou quatre aventuriers.
manifestation-of-corruption.10: Invoque deux Diablotins Noirs: normaux  deux aventuriers; un normal et un d'lite  trois aventuriers; d'lite  quatre aventuriers.
manifestation-of-corruption.11: Invoque un Diablotin Noir d'lite supplmentaire
manifestation-of-corruption.14: Pour les trois prochaines attaques le ciblant et lui causant des dgts, gagne %game.action.shield% 3.
manifestation-of-corruption.15: Cre un pige  %game.condition.disarm% et %game.condition.poison% sur chaque hexagone vide adjacent.
manifestation-of-corruption.16: Se %game.action.teleport% sur l'hexagone occup par l'adversaire le plus loign  %game.action.range%+1 et le %game.action.teleport% simultanment sur l'hexagone qu'il occupait.
manifestation-of-corruption.17: Invoque un Valrath Sauvage normal sur un hexagone adjacent pour chaque adversaire  %game.action.range%5.
manifestation-of-corruption.18: Tous les attaquants le prenant pour cible gagnent %game.condition.curse%.
manifestation-of-corruption.19: Tous les attaquants le prenant pour cible gagnent Dsavantage pour cette attaque.
manifestation-of-corruption.20: %game.action.attack%-1 sur un autre adversaire  %game.action.range%4 de la premire cible, puis %game.action.attack%-2 sur un troisime adversaire  %game.action.range%3 de la seconde cible.
manifestation-of-corruption.21: Invoque un claireur Esther : normal pour deux ou trois aventuriers, d'lite pour quatre aventuriers.
manifestation-of-corruption.22: Les trois prochaines fois qu'une source lui inflige des dgts, il ne subit pas de dgts  la place.

sraka-the-wise.1: Double toutes les valeurs de Soin. Si possible, les soins ciblent en priorit le Lion d'Acier
sraka-the-wise.2: Tous les tats %game.condition.curse% et %game.condition.bless% appliqus sont doubls

the-steel-lion.1: Toutes les attaques ciblant un de ses allis adjacents le prennent pour cible  la place, sans considration de porte
the-steel-lion.2: Les [C] premires fois qu'il subit %game.damage:6% ou plus provenant d'une seule source, il n'en subit aucun  la place

tracker.1: Cre un pige  %game.condition.disarm% sur l'hexagone vide adjacent le plus proche d'un adversaire.
tracker.2: Se focalise sur l'adversaire ayant le moins de points de vie.

uyart-ikkuma.1: Toutes ses invocations sont d'lite pour trois ou quatre aventuriers
uyart-ikkuma.2: Les effets %game.element.consume.fire% et %game.element.consume.earth% de ses cartes s'appliquent si un Dmon de l'lment correspondant est prsent sur le plateau

valrath-savage.1: Tous les allis adjacents ajoutent +1 %game.action.attack%  toutes leurs attaques
valrath-savage.2: Tous les allis adjacents ajoutent +2 %game.action.attack%  toutes leurs attaques
